title: Find a car MOT centre

introduction.content:
Find your nearest centres to get an MOT for your car.

^ You can be charged up to £54.85 for a car MOT. ^

Find your nearest centres to get an MOT for your car.

You can be charged up to £54.85 for a car MOT.

more_information.content:
You can only use this service to find car MOT centres. You can download a list of [MOT centres for other vehicles](http://data.gov.uk/dataset/mot-active-vts/resource/2ac8abba-4a71-4f12-af1b-57ad0e36b6a4) (eg motorcycles and motorhomes).

^ There's a different process to [find an MOT centre](http://www.nidirect.gov.uk/index/information-and-services/motoring/mot-and-vehicle-testing/about-the-mot-scheme/where-are-the-test-centres.htm) in Northern Ireland.^

You can only use this service to find car MOT centres. You can download a list of MOT centres for other vehicles (eg motorcycles and motorhomes).

There’s a different process to find an MOT centre in Northern Ireland.

description: Find your nearest MOT centres to get an MOT for your car

meets_user_needs.title: As a motorist, I need to find an MOT centre, so that I can get my vehicle MOT'd (103342)

details.benefit: I can get my vehicle MOT'd
details.impact: Noticed by the average member of the public
justifications: It's something that people can do or it's something people need to know before they can do something that's regulated by/related to government
There is clear demand for it from users
met_when: knows the address of their nearest MOT testing station

ordered_related_items.description: How to MOT your vehicle, MOT fees table, what the certificate covers, MOT exemptions, appeal if your vehicle fails its MOT test
ordered_related_items.title: Getting an MOT

parent.description: Apply for a driving licence, tax your vehicle, book your driving test, and find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver
parent.title: Driving and transport

ordered_related_items.description: Find out the MOT test status of a vehicle - check the date of the MOT test, the odometer reading (mileage) and the expiry date of an MOT test pass
ordered_related_items.title: Check the MOT status of a vehicle

parent.description: Apply for a driving licence, tax your vehicle, book your driving test, and find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver
parent.title: Driving and transport
